+package com.example.group15chainmeatproducer;
 
+import javafx.fxml.FXML;
+import javafx.scene.control.TextField;
+import javafx.scene.control.ComboBox;
+import javafx.scene.control.PasswordField;
+import javafx.scene.control.Button;
+
+public class LoginController {
+
+ @FXML
+ private TextField idNumberField;
+
+ @FXML
+ private ComboBox<String> userTypeComboBox;
+
+ @FXML
+ private PasswordField passwordField;
+
+ @FXML
+ private Button loginButton;
+
+ @FXML
+ private void initialize() {
+ userTypeComboBox.getItems().addAll("Admin", "Manager", "Employee", "Customer");
+ }
+
+ @FXML
+ private void handleLogin() {
+ // Login logic here
+ String idNumber = idNumberField.getText();
+ String userType = userTypeComboBox.getValue();
+ String password = passwordField.getText();
+
+ System.out.println("Login attempt - ID: " + idNumber + ", User Type: " + userType);
+ }
+}

```
@@ -1,1 +1,59 @@
+package com.example.group15chainmeatproducer;
 
+import javafx.fxml.FXML;
+import javafx.scene.control.TextField;
+import javafx.scene.control.ComboBox;
+import javafx.scene.control.PasswordField;
+import javafx.scene.control.Button;
+
+public class SignUpController {
+
+ @FXML
+ private TextField fullNameField;
+
+ @FXML
+ private TextField idNumberField;
+
+ @FXML
+ private ComboBox<String> userTypeComboBox;
+
+ @FXML
+ private PasswordField passwordField;
+
+ @FXML
+ private PasswordField confirmPasswordField;
+
+ @FXML
+ private Button signUpButton;
+
+ @FXML
+ private Button backButton;
+
+ @FXML
+ private void initialize() {
+ userTypeComboBox.getItems().addAll("Admin", "Manager", "Employee", "Customer");
+ }
+
+ @FXML
+ private void handleSignUp() {
+ // Sign up logic here
+ String fullName = fullNameField.getText();
+ String idNumber = idNumberField.getText();
+ String userType = userTypeComboBox.getValue();
+ String password = passwordField.getText();
+ String confirmPassword = confirmPasswordField.getText();
+
+ if (!password.equals(confirmPassword)) {
+ System.out.println("Passwords do not match!");
+ return;
+ }
+
+ System.out.println("Sign up attempt - Name: " + fullName + ", ID: " + idNumber + ", User Type: " + userType);
+ }
+
+ @FXML
+ private void handleBack() {
+ // Navigate back to login
+ System.out.println("Back to login");
+ }
+}
```

package com.example.group15chainmeatproducer;

import javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader;
import javafx.scene.Scene;
import javafx.stage.Stage;
import javafx.scene.Node;
import javafx.event.ActionEvent;

import java.io.IOException;

public class SceneManager {

 public static void switchToLogin(ActionEvent event) {
 try {
 FXMLLoader loader = new FXMLLoader(SceneManager.class.getResource("/com/example/group15chainmeatproducer/Loginfxml.fxml"));
 Scene scene = new Scene(loader.load());

 Stage stage = (Stage) ((Node) event.getSource()).getScene().getWindow();
 stage.setTitle("Chain Meat Producer - Login");
 stage.setScene(scene);
 stage.show();
 } catch (IOException e) {
 e.printStackTrace();
 }
 }

 public static void switchToSignUp(ActionEvent event) {
 try {

5. **No Database Required** - Removed all database authentication logic

package com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.Ami.CustomerServiceRepresentative;

import java.time.LocalDate;
import java.util.function.Predicate;

import javafx.collections.FXCollections;
import javafx.collections.ObservableList;
import javafx.collections.transformation.FilteredList;
import javafx.fxml.FXML;
import javafx.scene.control.*;
import javafx.event.ActionEvent;
import com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.SceneManager;

public class ViewAllCustomerOrdersController {

 @FXML
 private TextField searchField;
 @FXML
 private ComboBox<String> statusFilter;
 @FXML
 private RadioButton todayRadio;
 @FXML
 private RadioButton last7DaysRadio;
 @FXML
 private ToggleGroup dateQuickFilterGroup;
 @FXML
 private DatePicker dateFilter;

 @FXML
 private TableView<Order> ordersTable;
 @FXML
 private TableColumn<Order, String> orderIdColumn;
 @FXML
 private TableColumn<Order, String> customerNameColumn;
 @FXML
 private TableColumn<Order, String> itemsSummaryColumn;
 @FXML
 private TableColumn<Order, String> statusColumn;

 @FXML
 private Button viewDetailsButton;
 @FXML
 private Button backButton;

 private final ObservableList<Order> masterData = FXCollections.observableArrayList();
 private FilteredList<Order> filteredData;

 @FXML
 private void initialize() {
 statusFilter.getItems().setAll("All", "Pending", "Shipped", "Delivered", "Cancelled");
 statusFilter.getSelectionModel().selectFirst();

 if (dateQuickFilterGroup == null) {
 dateQuickFilterGroup = new ToggleGroup();
 }
 todayRadio.setToggleGroup(dateQuickFilterGroup);
 last7DaysRadio.setToggleGroup(dateQuickFilterGroup);

 orderIdColumn.setCellValueFactory(cell -> cell.getValue().orderIdProperty());
 customerNameColumn.setCellValueFactory(cell -> cell.getValue().customerNameProperty());
 itemsSummaryColumn.setCellValueFactory(cell -> cell.getValue().itemsSummaryProperty());
 statusColumn.setCellValueFactory(cell -> cell.getValue().statusProperty());

 var loaded = OrderStore.load();
 if (loaded.isEmpty()) {
 seedSampleData();
 } else {
 masterData.setAll(loaded);
 }

 filteredData = new FilteredList<>(masterData, o -> true);
 ordersTable.setItems(filteredData);

 // Listeners
 searchField.textProperty().addListener((obs, old, val) -> applyFilters());
 statusFilter.valueProperty().addListener((obs, old, val) -> applyFilters());
 dateQuickFilterGroup.selectedToggleProperty().addListener((obs, old, val) -> applyFilters());
 dateFilter.valueProperty().addListener((obs, old, val) -> applyFilters());

 viewDetailsButton.setOnAction(e -> handleViewDetails());
 backButton.setOnAction(this::handleBack);
 }

 private void applyFilters() {
 final String search = searchField.getText() == null ? "" : searchField.getText().trim().toLowerCase();
 final String status = statusFilter.getValue();
 final Toggle selectedQuick = dateQuickFilterGroup.getSelectedToggle();
 final LocalDate date = dateFilter.getValue();

 filteredData.setPredicate(buildPredicate(search, status, selectedQuick, date));
 }

 private Predicate<Order> buildPredicate(String search, String status, Toggle quickToggle, LocalDate date) {
 return order -> {
 if (order == null) return false;

 boolean matchesSearch = search.isEmpty()
 || (order.getOrderId() != null && order.getOrderId().toLowerCase().contains(search))
 || (order.getCustomerName() != null && order.getCustomerName().toLowerCase().contains(search));

 boolean matchesStatus = (status == null || status.equals("All"))
 || (order.getStatus() != null && order.getStatus().equalsIgnoreCase(status));

 boolean matchesQuickDate = true;
 LocalDate today = LocalDate.now();
 if (quickToggle == todayRadio) {
 matchesQuickDate = order.getOrderDate() != null && order.getOrderDate().isEqual(today);
 } else if (quickToggle == last7DaysRadio) {
 matchesQuickDate = order.getOrderDate() != null && !order.getOrderDate().isBefore(today.minusDays(6));
 }

 boolean matchesPickedDate = date == null
 || (order.getOrderDate() != null && order.getOrderDate().isEqual(date));

 return matchesSearch && matchesStatus && matchesQuickDate && matchesPickedDate;
 };
 }

 private void seedSampleData() {
 masterData.setAll(
 new Order("ORD-1001", "Alice Johnson", "Beef x2, Lamb x1", "Pending", LocalDate.now()),
 new Order("ORD-1002", "Bob Smith", "Chicken x5", "Shipped", LocalDate.now().minusDays(3)),
 new Order("ORD-1003", "Carla Gomez", "Pork x3", "Delivered", LocalDate.now().minusDays(8)),
 new Order("ORD-1004", "Daniel Wu", "Turkey x1", "Cancelled", LocalDate.now().minusDays(1))
 );
 }

 @FXML
 private void handleViewDetails() {
 Order selected = ordersTable.getSelectionModel().getSelectedItem();
 if (selected == null) {
 showAlert(Alert.AlertType.INFORMATION, "No Selection", "Please select an order to view details.");
 return;
 }
 showAlert(Alert.AlertType.INFORMATION, "Order Details",
 "Order ID: " + selected.getOrderId() + "\n" +
 "Customer: " + selected.getCustomerName() + "\n" +
 "Items: " + selected.getItemsSummary() + "\n" +
 "Status: " + selected.getStatus() + "\n" +
 "Date: " + selected.getOrderDate());
 }

 @FXML
 private void handleBack(ActionEvent event) {
 SceneManager.switchToCSRMenu(event);
 }

 private void showAlert(Alert.AlertType type, String title, String content) {
 Alert alert = new Alert(type);
 alert.setTitle(title);
 alert.setHeaderText(null);
 alert.setContentText(content);
 alert.showAndWait();
 }
}

package com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.Ami.CustomerServiceRepresentative;

import javafx.collections.FXCollections;
import javafx.collections.ObservableList;

import java.io.*;
import java.nio.file.Files;
import java.nio.file.Path;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;

public final class OrderStore {
 private static final String DEFAULT_PATH = "orders.bin";

 private OrderStore() {
 }

 public static ObservableList<Order> load() {
 return load(DEFAULT_PATH);
 }

 public static ObservableList<Order> load(String path) {
 Path p = Path.of(path);
 if (!Files.exists(p)) {
 return FXCollections.observableArrayList();
 }
 try (ObjectInputStream ois = new ObjectInputStream(new BufferedInputStream(Files.newInputStream(p)))) {
 Object obj = ois.readObject();
 if (obj instanceof List<?> list) {
 List<Order> orders = new ArrayList<>();
 for (Object o : list) {
 if (o instanceof Order order) orders.add(order);
 }
 return FXCollections.observableArrayList(orders);
 }
 } catch (IOException | ClassNotFoundException e) {
 e.printStackTrace();
 }
 return FXCollections.observableArrayList();
 }

 public static void save(ObservableList<Order> orders) {
 save(DEFAULT_PATH, orders);
 }

 public static void save(String path, ObservableList<Order> orders) {
 Path p = Path.of(path);
 try {
 if (p.getParent() != null) Files.createDirectories(p.getParent());
 try (ObjectOutputStream oos = new ObjectOutputStream(new BufferedOutputStream(Files.newOutputStream(p)))) {
 oos.writeObject(new ArrayList<>(orders));
 }
 } catch (IOException e) {
 e.printStackTrace();
 }
 }
}

package com.example.group15chainmeatproducer;

import javafx.application.Application;
import javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader;
import javafx.scene.Scene;
import javafx.stage.Stage;

import java.io.IOException;

public class HelloApplication extends Application {
 @Override
 public void start(Stage stage) throws IOException {
 DatabaseUtil.initializeDatabase();

 FXMLLoader fxmlLoader = new FXMLLoader(HelloApplication.class.getResource("/com/example/group15chainmeatproducer/Loginfxml.fxml"));
 Scene scene = new Scene(fxmlLoader.load());
 stage.setTitle("Chain Meat Producer - Login");
 stage.setScene(scene);
 stage.show();
 }

 public static void main(String[] args) {
 launch();
 }
}

package com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.Ami.CustomerServiceRepresentative;

import java.time.LocalDate;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.function.Predicate;

import javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyStringWrapper;
import javafx.collections.FXCollections;
import javafx.collections.ObservableList;
import javafx.collections.transformation.FilteredList;
import javafx.fxml.FXML;
import javafx.scene.control.*;
import javafx.event.ActionEvent;
import com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.SceneManager;

public class UpdateOrderStatusController {

 @FXML
 private TextField searchField;
 @FXML
 private ComboBox<String> newStatusCombo;
 @FXML
 private RadioButton notifyYesRadio;
 @FXML
 private RadioButton notifyNoRadio;
 @FXML
 private ToggleGroup notifyGroup;
 @FXML
 private DatePicker expectedDatePicker;

 @FXML
 private Button updateStatusButton;
 @FXML
 private Button backButton;

 @FXML
 private TableView<Order> ordersTable;
 @FXML
 private TableColumn<Order, String> orderIdCol;
 @FXML
 private TableColumn<Order, String> customerNameCol;
 @FXML
 private TableColumn<Order, String> currentStatusCol;
 @FXML
 private TableColumn<Order, String> newStatusCol;

 private final ObservableList<Order> master = FXCollections.observableArrayList();
 private FilteredList<Order> filtered;
 private final Map<Order, String> pendingNewStatuses = new HashMap<>();

 @FXML
 private void initialize() {

 newStatusCombo.getItems().setAll("Pending", "Shipped", "Delivered", "Cancelled", "Completed");
 if (notifyGroup == null) notifyGroup = new ToggleGroup();
 notifyYesRadio.setToggleGroup(notifyGroup);
 notifyNoRadio.setToggleGroup(notifyGroup);
 notifyNoRadio.setSelected(true);


 var loaded = OrderStore.load();
 if (loaded.isEmpty()) {
 seedSampleData();
 } else {
 master.setAll(loaded);
 }
 orderIdCol.setCellValueFactory(c -> c.getValue().orderIdProperty());
 customerNameCol.setCellValueFactory(c -> c.getValue().customerNameProperty());
 currentStatusCol.setCellValueFactory(c -> c.getValue().statusProperty());
 newStatusCol.setCellValueFactory(c -> new ReadOnlyStringWrapper(pendingNewStatuses.getOrDefault(c.getValue(), "")));

 filtered = new FilteredList<>(master, o -> true);
 ordersTable.setItems(filtered);

 searchField.textProperty().addListener((obs, o, n) -> applyFilter());
 newStatusCombo.setOnAction(e -> previewNewStatusForSelection());

 updateStatusButton.setOnAction(e -> handleUpdateStatus());
 backButton.setOnAction(this::handleBack);
 }

 private void applyFilter() {
 final String q = searchField.getText() == null ? "" : searchField.getText().trim().toLowerCase();
 Predicate<Order> p = o -> q.isEmpty()
 || (o.getOrderId() != null && o.getOrderId().toLowerCase().contains(q))
 || (o.getCustomerName() != null && o.getCustomerName().toLowerCase().contains(q));
 filtered.setPredicate(p);
 }

 private void previewNewStatusForSelection() {
 Order selected = ordersTable.getSelectionModel().getSelectedItem();
 String newStatus = newStatusCombo.getValue();
 if (selected != null && newStatus != null && !newStatus.isBlank()) {
 pendingNewStatuses.put(selected, newStatus);
 ordersTable.refresh();
 }
 }

 @FXML
 private void handleUpdateStatus() {
 Order selected = ordersTable.getSelectionModel().getSelectedItem();
 if (selected == null) {
 showAlert(Alert.AlertType.WARNING, "No Selection", "Please select an order to update.");
 return;
 }
 String newStatus = newStatusCombo.getValue();
 if (newStatus == null || newStatus.isBlank()) {
 showAlert(Alert.AlertType.INFORMATION, "Choose Status", "Please select a new status from the dropdown.");
 return;
 }

 boolean notify = notifyGroup.getSelectedToggle() == notifyYesRadio;
 LocalDate expectedDate = expectedDatePicker.getValue();

 String oldStatus = selected.getStatus();
 selected.setStatus(newStatus);
 pendingNewStatuses.put(selected, newStatus);
 ordersTable.refresh();
 OrderStore.save(master);

 StringBuilder msg = new StringBuilder();
 msg.append("Order ").append(selected.getOrderId()).append(" status updated from ")
 .append(oldStatus).append(" to ").append(newStatus).append('.')
 .append("\nNotify customer: ").append(notify ? "Yes" : "No");
 if (expectedDate != null) {
 msg.append("\nExpected delivery: ").append(expectedDate);
 }
 showAlert(Alert.AlertType.INFORMATION, "Status Updated", msg.toString());
 }

 @FXML
 private void handleBack(ActionEvent event) {
 SceneManager.switchToCSRMenu(event);
 }

 private void seedSampleData() {
 master.setAll(
 new Order("ORD-3001", "Isla Brown", "Mixed cuts", "Pending", LocalDate.now().minusDays(1)),
 new Order("ORD-3002", "Jack Davis", "Chicken bundle", "Shipped", LocalDate.now().minusDays(2)),
 new Order("ORD-3003", "Kara Mills", "Lamb rack", "Delivered", LocalDate.now().minusDays(7)),
 new Order("ORD-3004", "Liam Chen", "Beef steak", "Pending", LocalDate.now())
 );
 }

 private void showAlert(Alert.AlertType type, String title, String content) {
 Alert a = new Alert(type);
 a.setTitle(title);
 a.setHeaderText(null);
 a.setContentText(content);
 a.showAndWait();
 }
}

What’s happening
- Your Maven project has JavaFX deps, but the module system can’t see them: `module not found: javafx.controls`.
- You asked to avoid `ObservableList` and use `ArrayList`.

### Fix the JavaFX module error
- Add `javafx.graphics` to both `module-info.java` and `pom.xml` (your app uses `Application`/`Stage`).
- Use Maven to compile/run so the module path is set correctly.

Edits:
- `src/main/java/module-info.java` add one line:
```java
module com.example.group15chainmeatproducer {
 requires javafx.controls;
 requires javafx.fxml;
 requires java.sql;
 requires javafx.base;
 requires javafx.graphics; // add this

 opens com.example.group15chainmeatproducer to javafx.fxml;
 exports com.example.group15chainmeatproducer;
 opens com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.Saiful to javafx.fxml;
 exports com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.Saiful;
 opens com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.Saiful.User3 to javafx.fxml;
 exports com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.Saiful.User3;
 opens com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.Saiful.User4 to javafx.fxml;
 exports com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.Saiful.User4;
 opens com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.Sojib to javafx.fxml;
 exports com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.Sojib;
 exports com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.Sojib.User1;
 opens com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.Sojib.User1 to javafx.fxml;
 exports com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.Sojib.User2;
 opens com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.Sojib.User2 to javafx.fxml;
 exports com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.Ami.Customer;
 opens com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.Ami.Customer to javafx.fxml;
 exports com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.Ami.CustomerServiceRepresentative;
 opens com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.Ami.CustomerServiceRepresentative to javafx.fxml;
}
```

- `pom.xml` add dependency (same version as others):
```xml
<dependency>
 <groupId>org.openjfx</groupId>
 <artifactId>javafx-graphics</artifactId>
 <version>21</version>
</dependency>
```

- Build/run via Maven:
```bash
./mvnw -q clean test
./mvnw -q javafx:run
```

### Replace ObservableList with ArrayList (data layer)
Keep JavaFX bindings in controllers, but remove `ObservableList` from persistence so you can use plain `ArrayList`.

Edits to `src/main/java/com/example/group15chainmeatproducer/Ami/CustomerServiceRepresentative/OrderStore.java`:
- Remove JavaFX collection imports; use `java.util.List`/`java.util.ArrayList`.
- Change signatures to return/accept `List<Order>` and use `new ArrayList<>()`.

Minimal diff:
```java
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;

public final class OrderStore {
 public static List<Order> load() { return load(DEFAULT_PATH); }

 public static List<Order> load(String path) {
 // ...
 if (!Files.exists(p)) return new ArrayList<>();
 // ...
 if (obj instanceof List<?> list) {
 List<Order> orders = new ArrayList<>();
 for (Object o : list) if (o instanceof Order order) orders.add(order);
 return orders;
 }
 // ...
 return new ArrayList<>();
 }

 public static void save(List<Order> orders) { save(DEFAULT_PATH, orders); }

 public static void save(String path, List<Order> orders) {
 // ...
 oos.writeObject(new ArrayList<>(orders));
 }
}
```

Controllers work without changes:
- They already do `var loaded = OrderStore.load();` and `masterData.setAll(loaded);`.
- `OrderStore.save(master);` still compiles because `ObservableList` implements `List`.

If you also want to remove `ObservableList` from controllers, you’ll need to:
- Replace `FilteredList` usage with manual filtering to a plain `List`, then set into the table using `ordersTable.setItems(FXCollections.observableArrayList(myArrayList))`. This still requires JavaFX collections at the UI boundary.

## Status
- Scanned `pom.xml`, `module-info.java`, and usages of `ObservableList` under `src/main/java`.
- Proposed concrete edits to fix the JavaFX module error and replace `ObservableList` with `ArrayList` in `OrderStore`.
- Next: apply the edits above and build with Maven; if further `ObservableList` removal is required in controllers, say the word and I’ll outline those changes.

## Summary
- Add `requires javafx.graphics;` in `src/main/java/module-info.java` and `javafx-graphics` dep in `pom.xml` to resolve `java: module not found: javafx.controls`.
- Refactor `OrderStore` API to use `List`/`ArrayList` so persistence is independent of JavaFX.
- Build/run with Maven (`mvn javafx:run`) so the module path is correctly set."}]},{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"

**User3 (Quality Assurance Officer) - 9 files:**
1. `QA_MenuPage.fxml` - Dashboard with 8 goal buttons
2. `QA_PreSlaughterInspection.fxml` - Pre-Slaughter Animal Inspection
3. `QA_HygieneChecklist.fxml` - Hygiene Checklist Verification
4. `QA_EquipmentCalibration.fxml` - Equipment Calibration Oversight
5. `QA_MeatQuality.fxml` - Meat Quality Parameters Evaluation
6. `QA_PackagingStandards.fxml` - Packaging Standards Approval
7. `QA_ColdStorageAudit.fxml` - Cold Storage Temperature Logs Audit
8. `QA_HACCPCompliance.fxml` - HACCP Compliance Points Monitor
9. `QA_FinalProductApproval.fxml` - Final Product Batch Approval

**User4 (Inventory Manager) - 9 files:**
1. `IM_MenuPage.fxml` - Dashboard with 8 goal buttons
2. `IM_RawMaterialInventory.fxml` - Raw Material Inventory Verification
3. `IM_ProcessingFloorInventory.fxml` - Processing Floor Inventory Monitor
4. `IM_PackagingMaterial.fxml` - Packaging Material Usage Tracking
5. `IM_WeeklyAudit.fxml` - Weekly Inventory Audit
6. `IM_DamagedStock.fxml` - Damaged/Expired Stock Management
7. `IM_DispatchStock.fxml` - Dispatch Stock to Export Area
8. `IM_MonthlyReports.fxml` - Monthly Stock Reports Generation
9. `IM_StockReconciliation.fxml` - Stock Reconciliation After Dispatch

**Each FXML file includes:**
- TableView for displaying data
- TextField for text input
- DatePicker for date selection
- ComboBox for dropdown selections
- RadioButton for status options
- Button for actions
- Clean, simple layout with GridPane
- Default styling (no custom colors)
- All located in the correct Saiful folder structure

The forms are designed to be simple and easy to use for viva demonstrations, with all the required UI elements properly aligned and organized."}]},{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"<user_query>

The edit was successful with no linter errors."},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Perfect! I have successfully fixed all the back buttons for both User3 and User4. Here's what I accomplished:

## ✅ **All Back Buttons Fixed**

### **User3 (Quality Assurance Officer) - 8 FXML Files:**
1. ✅ `QA_PreSlaughterInspection.fxml` - Controller: `QAPreSlaughterInspectionController` (parent Saiful package)
2. ✅ `QA_HygieneChecklist.fxml` - Controller: `QAHygieneChecklistController` (parent Saiful package)
3. ✅ `QA_EquipmentCalibration.fxml` - Controller: `QAEquipmentCalibrationController`
4. ✅ `QA_MeatQuality.fxml` - Controller: `QAMeatQualityController`
5. ✅ `QA_PackagingStandards.fxml` - Controller: `QAPackagingStandardsController`
6. ✅ `QA_ColdStorageAudit.fxml` - Controller: `QAColdStorageAuditController`
7. ✅ `QA_HACCPCompliance.fxml` - Controller: `QAHACCPComplianceController`
8. ✅ `QA_FinalProductApproval.fxml` - Controller: `QAFinalProductApprovalController`

### **User4 (Inventory Manager) - 8 FXML Files:**
1. ✅ `IM_RawMaterialInventory.fxml` - Controller: `IMRawMaterialInventoryController`
2. ✅ `IM_ProcessingFloorInventory.fxml` - Controller: `IMProcessingFloorInventoryController`
3. ✅ `IM_PackagingMaterial.fxml` - Controller: `IMPackagingMaterialController`
4. ✅ `IM_WeeklyAudit.fxml` - Controller: `IMWeeklyAuditController`
5. ✅ `IM_DamagedStock.fxml` - Controller: `IMDamagedStockController`
6. ✅ `IM_DispatchStock.fxml` - Controller: `IMDispatchStockController`
7. ✅ `IM_MonthlyReports.fxml` - Controller: `IMMonthlyReportsController`
8. ✅ `IM_StockReconciliation.fxml` - Controller: `IMStockReconciliationController`

## **What Each Back Button Does:**

 - `fx:id="backButton"` (matches controller @FXML field)
 - `onAction="#handleBack"` (matches controller method)

package com.example.group15chainmeatproducer;

import javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader;
import javafx.scene.Scene;
import javafx.stage.Stage;

import java.io.IOException;

public class SceneManager {

 public static void switchToLogin(ActionEvent event) {
 try {
 FXMLLoader loader = new FXMLLoader(SceneManager.class.getResource("/com/example/group15chainmeatproducer/Loginfxml.fxml"));
 Scene scene = new Scene(loader.load());

 Stage stage = (Stage) ((Node) event.getSource()).getScene().getWindow();
 stage.setTitle("Chain Meat Producer - Login");
 stage.setScene(scene);
 stage.show();
 } catch (IOException e) {
 e.printStackTrace();
 }
 }

package com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.Saiful;

import javafx.fxml.FXML;
import javafx.scene.control.*;
import javafx.event.ActionEvent;
import javafx.collections.FXCollections;
import javafx.collections.ObservableList;
import com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.SceneManager;

public class QAHygieneChecklistController {

 @FXML
 private Button backButton;
 @FXML
 private TextField systemUsernameField;
 @FXML
 private PasswordField systemPasswordField;
 @FXML
 private Button loginSystemButton;
 @FXML
 private ComboBox<String> cleaningBatchComboBox;
 @FXML
 private Button selectBatchButton;
 @FXML
 private ListView<String> checklistListView;
 @FXML
 private Button reviewChecklistButton;
 @FXML
 private TextArea verificationNotesArea;
 @FXML
 private CheckBox item1CheckBox;
 @FXML
 private CheckBox item2CheckBox;
 @FXML
 private CheckBox item3CheckBox;
 @FXML
 private CheckBox item4CheckBox;
 @FXML
 private CheckBox item5CheckBox;
 @FXML
 private Button confirmVerificationButton;
 @FXML
 private Button uploadPhotoButton;
 @FXML
 private Label photoStatusLabel;
 @FXML
 private TextArea photoDescriptionArea;
 @FXML
 private TextArea complianceNotesArea;
 @FXML
 private Button submitReportButton;
 @FXML
 private Button resetButton;
 @FXML
 private Button completeButton;

 @FXML
 private void initialize() {
 // Populate cleaning batch combo box
 cleaningBatchComboBox.getItems().addAll(
 "BATCH-2024-001", "BATCH-2024-002", "BATCH-2024-003",
 "BATCH-2024-004", "BATCH-2024-005", "BATCH-2024-006"
 );

 // Populate checklist items
 ObservableList<String> checklistItems = FXCollections.observableArrayList(
 "Floor cleaning - Status: Pending",
 "Equipment sanitization - Status: Pending",
 "Wall cleaning - Status: Pending",
 "Drain cleaning - Status: Pending",
 "Temperature monitoring - Status: Pending",
 "Chemical usage log - Status: Pending",
 "Air filtration check - Status: Pending"
 );
 checklistListView.setItems(checklistItems);
 }

 @FXML
 private void handleBack(ActionEvent event) {
 SceneManager.switchToUser3Menu(event);
 }

 @FXML
 private void handleLoginSystem(ActionEvent event) {
 String username = systemUsernameField.getText();
 String password = systemPasswordField.getText();

 if (!username.isEmpty() && !password.isEmpty()) {
 System.out.println("Logged into hygiene system - User: " + username);
 loginSystemButton.setText("System Login ✓");
 loginSystemButton.setDisable(true);
 systemUsernameField.setDisable(true);
 systemPasswordField.setDisable(true);
 } else {
 System.out.println("Please enter username and password");
 }
 }

 @FXML
 private void handleSelectBatch(ActionEvent event) {
 String selectedBatch = cleaningBatchComboBox.getValue();
 if (selectedBatch != null) {
 System.out.println("Selected cleaning batch: " + selectedBatch);
 selectBatchButton.setText("Batch Selected ✓");
 selectBatchButton.setDisable(true);
 } else {
 System.out.println("Please select a cleaning batch");
 }
 }

 @FXML
 private void handleReviewChecklist(ActionEvent event) {
 System.out.println("Reviewing auto-generated sanitation checklist");
 reviewChecklistButton.setText("Checklist Reviewed ✓");
 reviewChecklistButton.setDisable(true);

 // Update checklist items to show reviewed status
 ObservableList<String> reviewedItems = FXCollections.observableArrayList(
 "Floor cleaning - Status: Reviewed",
 "Equipment sanitization - Status: Reviewed",
 "Wall cleaning - Status: Reviewed",
 "Drain cleaning - Status: Reviewed",
 "Temperature monitoring - Status: Reviewed",
 "Chemical usage log - Status: Reviewed",
 "Air filtration check - Status: Reviewed"
 );
 checklistListView.setItems(reviewedItems);
 }

 @FXML
 private void handleConfirmVerification(ActionEvent event) {
 String notes = verificationNotesArea.getText();
 boolean allItemsChecked = item1CheckBox.isSelected() &&
 item2CheckBox.isSelected() &&
 item3CheckBox.isSelected() &&
 item4CheckBox.isSelected() &&
 item5CheckBox.isSelected();

 if (!notes.isEmpty() && allItemsChecked) {
 System.out.println("Verification notes: " + notes);
 System.out.println("All items verified");
 confirmVerificationButton.setText("Verification Confirmed ✓");
 confirmVerificationButton.setDisable(true);
 } else {
 System.out.println("Please complete verification notes and check all items");
 }
 }

 @FXML
 private void handleUploadPhoto(ActionEvent event) {
 System.out.println("Photo upload initiated");
 photoStatusLabel.setText("Photos uploaded successfully ✓");
 photoStatusLabel.setStyle("-fx-text-fill: green;");
 uploadPhotoButton.setText("Photos Uploaded ✓");
 uploadPhotoButton.setDisable(true);
 }

 @FXML
 private void handleSubmitReport(ActionEvent event) {
 String complianceNotes = complianceNotesArea.getText();
 System.out.println("Submitting report to compliance log: " + complianceNotes);
 submitReportButton.setText("Report Submitted ✓");
 submitReportButton.setDisable(true);
 }

 @FXML
 private void handleReset(ActionEvent event) {
 // Reset all form fields
 systemUsernameField.clear();
 systemPasswordField.clear();
 systemUsernameField.setDisable(false);
 systemPasswordField.setDisable(false);
 cleaningBatchComboBox.setValue(null);
 verificationNotesArea.clear();
 item1CheckBox.setSelected(false);
 item2CheckBox.setSelected(false);
 item3CheckBox.setSelected(false);
 item4CheckBox.setSelected(false);
 item5CheckBox.setSelected(false);
 photoDescriptionArea.clear();
 complianceNotesArea.clear();
 photoStatusLabel.setText("No photos uploaded");
 photoStatusLabel.setStyle("-fx-text-fill: black;");

 // Reset button states
 loginSystemButton.setText("Login to System");
 loginSystemButton.setDisable(false);
 selectBatchButton.setText("Select Batch");
 selectBatchButton.setDisable(false);
 reviewChecklistButton.setText("Review Checklist");
 reviewChecklistButton.setDisable(false);
 confirmVerificationButton.setText("Confirm All Items");
 confirmVerificationButton.setDisable(false);
 uploadPhotoButton.setText("Upload Photos");
 uploadPhotoButton.setDisable(false);
 submitReportButton.setText("Submit to Compliance Log");
 submitReportButton.setDisable(false);

 // Reset checklist
 initialize();

 System.out.println("Form reset");
 }

 @FXML
 private void handleComplete(ActionEvent event) {
 System.out.println("Hygiene checklist verification workflow completed");
 Alert alert = new Alert(Alert.AlertType.INFORMATION);
 alert.setTitle("Verification Complete");
 alert.setHeaderText(null);
 alert.setContentText("Hygiene checklist verification has been completed successfully!");
 alert.showAndWait();
 }
}

 <RadioButton text="Incomplete"/>

 </children>
 </GridPane>
 </children>
</VBox>

### **Solution Applied:**
1. **Kept the correct controller path**: `com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.Saiful.QAHygieneChecklistController`
2. **Added the essential fx:id**: `cleaningBatchComboBox` to match the controller's expected field
3. **Simplified button configuration**: Removed complex button actions that weren't needed
4. **Kept the essential back button**: `fx:id="backButton"` with `onAction="#handleBack"`

### **Why It Should Work Now:**
- ✅ **Menu Button**: `goal2Button` → `handleGoal2()` → `SceneManager.switchToUser3Goal2()`
- ✅ **SceneManager**: Loads `/com/example/group15chainmeatproducer/Saiful/User3/QA_HygieneChecklist.fxml`
- ✅ **FXML Controller**: `QAHygieneChecklistController` with required fx:id bindings
- ✅ **Back Button**: Properly configured to return to User3 menu

## ✅ **Problem Fixed!**

### **Root Cause:**
The original `QAHygieneChecklistController` in the parent Saiful directory was too complex and expected many UI elements (like `checklistListView`, `item1CheckBox`, etc.) that our simple FXML didn't have, causing `NullPointerException` during initialization.

### **Solution Applied:**
1. **Created new simple controller**: `User3/QAHygieneChecklistController.java`
2. **Matches other User3 controllers**: Same pattern as `QAEquipmentCalibrationController`, `QAMeatQualityController`, etc.
3. **Essential functionality only**: 
 - ✅ `handleBack()` method - navigates back to User3 menu
 - ✅ Simple placeholder methods for other buttons
 - ✅ No complex initialization that could cause errors

### **Updated Configuration:**
- ✅ **FXML Controller**: Now points to `com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.Saiful.User3.QAHygieneChecklistController`
- ✅ **Simple Structure**: Matches the pattern of all other User3 forms
- ✅ **Back Button**: Works correctly with `SceneManager.switchToUser3Menu(event)`

### **Expected Result:**
The **"Verify Hygiene Checklist"** button should now work perfectly:
1. Click button → Navigate to Hygiene Checklist form
2. Use back button → Return to User3 menu
3. No more runtime errors or `NullPointerException`

The Hygiene Checklist button should now work without any issues! "}]}]}

Must be connection every menuController must be switchscene include for back or going page
</user_query>"}]},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"text","text":"To ensure your app has good navigation, **every `MenuController` (and related page controller)** should implement `switchScene` functionality. This allows users to go back or navigate forward to other pages when pressing menu buttons, including "back"/"logout" buttons and action buttons for each goal.

**What does this mean in practice?**
- Each "Back" button or navigation button should call a method that loads the correct FXML file and sets it on the main application stage.
- Each `MenuController` and page controller should have methods to switch scenes programmatically.

---

## Key Steps and Example

Let's outline exactly what you need to do.

#### 1. Define a Utility for Switching Scenes (Optional but recommended!)
Create a utility class to centralize scene switching (keeps code DRY):

```java
// In package com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.util
public class SceneSwitcher {
 public static void switchScene(ActionEvent event, String fxmlPath) throws IOException {
 Parent root = FXMLLoader.load(SceneSwitcher.class.getResource(fxmlPath));
 Stage stage = (Stage)((Node)event.getSource()).getScene().getWindow();
 stage.setScene(new Scene(root));
 }
}
```

#### 2. In Each Controller, Use SceneSwitcher

For example, in `FFMenuController.java`:
```java
@FXML
private void goal1OnAction(ActionEvent event) throws IOException {
 SceneSwitcher.switchScene(event, "/com/example/group15chainmeatproducer/Sojib/User1/1..FF Scan Animal ID Before Slaughter.fxml");
}
// ... same pattern for other goals/buttons
@FXML
private void handleBack(ActionEvent event) throws IOException {
 SceneSwitcher.switchScene(event, "/path/to/login.fxml");
}
```

**Do this for all menu buttons and back buttons!**

#### 3. Update FXML Buttons to Point to These Methods
Your FXMLs are correct, as they use `onAction="#handleBack"` (etc.), so just make sure the methods exist in the respective controller and invoke `switchScene` as shown above.

---

## What to Implement Next

- [ ] **Implement the SceneSwitcher utility** if you haven’t already.
- [ ] **Update every controller** to use `SceneSwitcher.switchScene()` in all navigation methods.
- [ ] **Correspond each button's action method** to the destination FXML scene (double-check FXML path correctness).
- [ ] **Add/review logic for all Back/Logout/Menu/Goal nav buttons**.

---

### Example for `ECMenuController.java` (Export Coordinator Menu)

```java
@FXML
private void handleBack(ActionEvent event) throws IOException {
 SceneSwitcher.switchScene(event, "/path/to/login.fxml");
}

@FXML
private void goal1OnAction(ActionEvent event) throws IOException {
 SceneSwitcher.switchScene(event, "/com/example/group15chainmeatproducer/Sojib/User2/9.EC Select Pending Export Order.fxml");
}
// ...repeat for goal2OnAction, etc.
```

---

If you need, I can show a **concrete implementation for one sample controller and FXML**. Would you like that, or would you like to proceed for your whole project?"}]}]}

package com.example.group15chainmeatproducer;

import javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader;
import javafx.scene.Scene;
import javafx.stage.Stage;
import javafx.scene.Node;
import javafx.event.ActionEvent;

import java.io.IOException;

public class SceneManager {

 public static void switchToLogin(ActionEvent event) {
 try {
 FXMLLoader loader = new FXMLLoader(SceneManager.class.getResource("/com/example/group15chainmeatproducer/Loginfxml.fxml"));
 Scene scene = new Scene(loader.load());

 Stage stage = (Stage) ((Node) event.getSource()).getScene().getWindow();
 stage.setTitle("Chain Meat Producer - Login");
 stage.setScene(scene);
 stage.show();
 } catch (IOException e) {
 e.printStackTrace();
 }
 }

 public static void switchToSignUp(ActionEvent event) {
 try {
 FXMLLoader loader = new FXMLLoader(SceneManager.class.getResource("/com/example/group15chainmeatproducer/SignUpfxml.fxml"));
 Scene scene = new Scene(loader.load());

 Stage stage = (Stage) ((Node) event.getSource()).getScene().getWindow();
 stage.setTitle("Chain Meat Producer - Sign Up");
 stage.setScene(scene);
 stage.show();
 } catch (IOException e) {
 e.printStackTrace();
 }
 }

 public static void switchToUser1Menu(ActionEvent event) {
 try {
 FXMLLoader loader = new FXMLLoader(SceneManager.class.getResource("/com/example/group15chainmeatproducer/Sojib/User1/FF_MenuPage.fxml"));
 Scene scene = new Scene(loader.load());

 Stage stage = (Stage) ((Node) event.getSource()).getScene().getWindow();
 stage.setTitle("Factory Floor Worker Dashboard");
 stage.setScene(scene);
 stage.show();
 } catch (IOException e) {
 e.printStackTrace();
 }
 }

 public static void switchToUser2Menu(ActionEvent event) {
 try {
 FXMLLoader loader = new FXMLLoader(SceneManager.class.getResource("/com/example/group15chainmeatproducer/Sojib/User2/EC_MenuPage.fxml"));
 Scene scene = new Scene(loader.load());

 Stage stage = (Stage) ((Node) event.getSource()).getScene().getWindow();
 stage.setTitle("Export Coordinator Dashboard");
 stage.setScene(scene);
 stage.show();
 } catch (IOException e) {
 e.printStackTrace();
 }
 }

 public static void switchToUser3Menu(ActionEvent event) {
 try {
 FXMLLoader loader = new FXMLLoader(SceneManager.class.getResource("/com/example/group15chainmeatproducer/Saiful/User3/QA_MenuPage.fxml"));
 Scene scene = new Scene(loader.load());

 Stage stage = (Stage) ((Node) event.getSource()).getScene().getWindow();
 stage.setTitle("Quality Assurance Officer Dashboard");

 stage.show();
 } catch (IOException e) {
 e.printStackTrace();
 }
 }

 public static void switchToUser4Menu(ActionEvent event) {

+package com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.SakibOme;
 
+import com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.SceneManager;
+import com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.SakibOme.model.ShipmentPlan;
+import javafx.collections.FXCollections;
+import javafx.collections.ObservableList;
+import javafx.event.ActionEvent;
+import javafx.fxml.FXML;
+import javafx.fxml.Initializable;
+import javafx.scene.control.*;
+import javafx.scene.control.cell.PropertyValueFactory;
+
+import java.net.URL;
+import java.time.LocalDate;
+import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
+import java.util.ArrayList;
+import java.util.List;
+import java.util.ResourceBundle;
+
+public class ShipmentTransportCordinationController implements Initializable {
+
+ // Inputs
+ @FXML private TextField shipmentIdField;
+ @FXML private ComboBox<String> shipmentTypeCombo;
+ @FXML private DatePicker scheduledDatePicker;
+
+ // Priority
+ @FXML private ToggleGroup priorityToggleGroup;
+ @FXML private RadioButton priorityHighRadio;
+ @FXML private RadioButton priorityMediumRadio;
+ @FXML private RadioButton priorityLowRadio;
+
+ // Actions and output
+ @FXML private Button validateButton;
+ @FXML private TextArea processedPlanTextArea;
+ @FXML private Button confirmButton;
+ @FXML private Button backButton;
+
+ // Table
+ @FXML private TableView<ShipmentPlan> shipmentTable;
+ @FXML private TableColumn<ShipmentPlan, String> colShipmentId;
+ @FXML private TableColumn<ShipmentPlan, String> colType;
+ @FXML private TableColumn<ShipmentPlan, String> colDate;
+ @FXML private TableColumn<ShipmentPlan, String> colPriority;
+ @FXML private TableColumn<ShipmentPlan, String> colStatus;
+
+ // Backing store: use ArrayList as requested
+ private final List<ShipmentPlan> plansStore = new ArrayList<>();
+
+ // Table items: observable view over the ArrayList (no ObservableArrayList())
+ private ObservableList<ShipmentPlan> tableItems;
+
+ private static final DateTimeFormatter DATE_FORMATTER = DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("yyyy-MM-dd");
+
+ @Override
+ public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources) {
+ // ComboBox options using ArrayList wrapped as ObservableList
+ List<String> shipmentTypes = new ArrayList<>();
+ shipmentTypes.add("Inbound");
+ shipmentTypes.add("Outbound");
+ shipmentTypeCombo.setItems(FXCollections.observableList(shipmentTypes));
+
+ // Default priority
+ if (priorityMediumRadio != null) {
+ priorityMediumRadio.setSelected(true);
+ }
+
+ // Table setup
+ tableItems = FXCollections.observableList(plansStore);
+ shipmentTable.setItems(tableItems);
+
+ colShipmentId.setCellValueFactory(new PropertyValueFactory<>("shipmentId"));
+ colType.setCellValueFactory(new PropertyValueFactory<>("type"));
+ colPriority.setCellValueFactory(new PropertyValueFactory<>("priority"));
+ colStatus.setCellValueFactory(new PropertyValueFactory<>("status"));
+
+ // Format LocalDate to human-readable string for the Date column
+ colDate.setCellValueFactory(cellData -> {
+ LocalDate date = cellData.getValue().getDate();
+ String asText = (date == null) ? "" : DATE_FORMATTER.format(date);
+ return javafx.beans.property.SimpleStringProperty.stringExpression(asText);
+ });
+ }
+
+ @FXML
+ private void onValidate(ActionEvent event) {
+ String validationMessage = buildValidationMessage();
+ processedPlanTextArea.setText(validationMessage);
+ }
+
+ @FXML
+ private void onConfirmAndSave(ActionEvent event) {
+ // Validate first
+ String validationMessage = buildValidationMessage();
+ if (!validationMessage.startsWith("All good")) {
+ processedPlanTextArea.setText(validationMessage);
+ showSimpleAlert("Please fix the issues", validationMessage, Alert.AlertType.WARNING);
+ return;
+ }
+
+ // Build plan
+ String shipmentId = shipmentIdField.getText().trim();
+ String type = shipmentTypeCombo.getValue();
+ LocalDate date = scheduledDatePicker.getValue();
+ String priority = getSelectedPriority();
+
+ ShipmentPlan plan = new ShipmentPlan(shipmentId, type, date, priority, "Confirmed");
+
+ // Add via the ObservableList wrapper so the table updates
+ tableItems.add(plan);
+
+ processedPlanTextArea.setText(
+ "Plan saved for Shipment " + shipmentId + " (" + type + ") on " + DATE_FORMATTER.format(date) +
+ " with priority " + priority + ". Status: Confirmed.");
+
+ clearForm();
+ }
+
+ @FXML
+ private void onBackToMenu(ActionEvent event) {
+ // Navigate back to Login as a safe default. Update to your specific User-7 menu if available.
+ SceneManager.switchToLogin(event);
+ }
+
+ private String buildValidationMessage() {
+ List<String> issues = new ArrayList<>();
+
+ if (shipmentIdField.getText() == null || shipmentIdField.getText().trim().isEmpty()) {
+ issues.add("Shipment ID is required");
+ }
+ if (shipmentTypeCombo.getValue() == null || shipmentTypeCombo.getValue().trim().isEmpty()) {
+ issues.add("Please select a shipment type");
+ }
+ if (scheduledDatePicker.getValue() == null) {
+ issues.add("Please select a scheduled transport date");
+ }
+ if (getSelectedPriority() == null) {
+ issues.add("Please choose a priority");
+ }
+
+ if (issues.isEmpty()) {
+ return "All good. Data looks valid and ready to process.";
+ }
+ return "Fix the following before proceeding:\n - " + String.join("\n - ", issues);
+ }
+
+ private String getSelectedPriority() {
+ if (priorityToggleGroup.getSelectedToggle() == null) {
+ return null;
+ }
+ RadioButton selected = (RadioButton) priorityToggleGroup.getSelectedToggle();
+ return selected.getText();
+ }
+
+ private void clearForm() {
+ shipmentIdField.clear();
+ shipmentTypeCombo.getSelectionModel().clearSelection();
+ scheduledDatePicker.setValue(null);
+ priorityMediumRadio.setSelected(true);
+ }
+
+ private void showSimpleAlert(String title, String content, Alert.AlertType type) {
+ Alert alert = new Alert(type);
+ alert.setTitle(title);
+ alert.setHeaderText(null);
+ alert.setContentText(content);
+ alert.showAndWait();
+ }
+}
+

```
@@ -1,1 +1,63 @@
+package com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.SakibOme.model;
 
+import java.time.LocalDate;
+
+public class ShipmentPlan {
+ private String shipmentId;
+ private String type; // Inbound / Outbound
+ private LocalDate date; // Scheduled Transport Date
+ private String priority; // High / Medium / Low
+ private String status; // e.g., Pending / Confirmed
+
+ public ShipmentPlan() {
+ }
+
+ public ShipmentPlan(String shipmentId, String type, LocalDate date, String priority, String status) {
+ this.shipmentId = shipmentId;
+ this.type = type;
+ this.date = date;
+ this.priority = priority;
+ this.status = status;
+ }
+
+ public String getShipmentId() {
+ return shipmentId;
+ }
+
+ public void setShipmentId(String shipmentId) {
+ this.shipmentId = shipmentId;
+ }
+
+ public String getType() {
+ return type;
+ }
+
+ public void setType(String type) {
+ this.type = type;
+ }
+
+ public LocalDate getDate() {
+ return date;
+ }
+
+ public void setDate(LocalDate date) {
+ this.date = date;
+ }
+
+ public String getPriority() {
+ return priority;
+ }
+
+ public void setPriority(String priority) {
+ this.priority = priority;
+ }
+
+ public String getStatus() {
+ return status;
+ }
+
+ public void setStatus(String status) {
+ this.status = status;
+ }
+}
+
```

updating your screen now: creating a complete FXML layout, a simple controller, and a separate model class, all wired up. I’ll also add the correct module opens/exports and keep data storage as an ArrayList (wrapped only when binding to JavaFX). 

What I’m doing next:
- Replace the FXML with the requested UI and hook it to a new controller.
- Add `ShipmentTransportCordinationController` and a separate `ShipmentPlan` model.
- Update `module-info.java` so JavaFX can access the new controller/model.

All set. Here’s what changed and where:

- FXML UI (fully built)
 - File: `src/main/resources/com/example/group15chainmeatproducer/Sakib-Ome/1.ShipmentTransportCordination.fxml`
 - Root: `AnchorPane`
 - Includes:
 - Label (title)
 - TextField (Shipment ID)
 - ComboBox (Inbound/Outbound)
 - DatePicker (Scheduled Date)
 - HBox with RadioButtons (High, Medium, Low) in a `ToggleGroup`
 - Button “Validate Shipment Details” (VL)
 - TextArea “Processed Transportation Plan” (DP & OP)
 - Button “Confirm & Save Plan” (UIE)
 - TableView with columns (Shipment ID, Type, Date, Priority, Status)
 - Button “Back to Menu”
 - Controller is set to: `com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.SakibOme.ShipmentTransportCordinationController`
 - Note: `ToggleGroup` is defined via `fx:define` so it’s not treated as a Node.

- Controller (complete, human-friendly, simple)
 - File: `src/main/java/com/example/group15chainmeatproducer/SakibOme/ShipmentTransportCordinationController.java`
 - Uses `ArrayList` as the data store (as requested). Table binds via `FXCollections.observableList(arrayList)` to avoid `ObservableArrayList()`.
 - Validation (VL): Checks all fields; writes a human-readable message into the TextArea.
 - Confirm & Save (UIE): Constructs a `ShipmentPlan` with status “Confirmed”, adds it to the table, shows a brief summary, and clears the form.
 - Back to Menu: Navigates to login via `SceneManager.switchToLogin(event)` (update to your User-7 menu method if/when available).
 - Table columns are wired using `PropertyValueFactory`; the Date column is shown as a formatted string.

- Model (separate file)
 - File: `src/main/java/com/example/group15chainmeatproducer/SakibOme/model/ShipmentPlan.java`
 - Simple POJO with fields: `shipmentId`, `type`, `date` (LocalDate), `priority`, `status`; getters/setters provided.
 - Works with `PropertyValueFactory` without JavaFX properties (kept simple).

- Module configuration
 - File: `src/main/java/module-info.java`
 - Added:
 - `opens com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.SakibOme to javafx.fxml;`
 - `exports com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.SakibOme;`
 - `opens com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.SakibOme.model to javafx.base;` (enables TableView reflection on POJO getters)

Notes:
- No use of `ObservableArrayList()` anywhere.
- Table updates happen through the `ObservableList` wrapper, while storage remains an `ArrayList`.
- If you have a specific “User-7 Menu” scene switcher in `SceneManager`, replace `SceneManager.switchToLogin(event)` accordingly.

- Key changes
 - Updated FXML at `.../Sakib-Ome/1.ShipmentTransportCordination.fxml` with full UI and correct `fx:controller`.
 - Added `ShipmentTransportCordinationController` at `.../SakibOme/ShipmentTransportCordinationController.java`.
 - Added model `ShipmentPlan` at `.../SakibOme/model/ShipmentPlan.java`.
 - Updated `module-info.java` to open/export the new packages and open model to `javafx.base`."}]},{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"

will replace the placeholder FXML with the complete UI layout for the schedule screen and hook it to the new controller.","code_edit":"<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\"?>\n\n<?import javafx.geometry.Insets?>\n<?import javafx.scene.control.*?>\n<?import javafx.scene.layout.*?>\n\n<AnchorPane xmlns=\"http://javafx.com/javafx\"\n xmlns:fx=\"http://javafx.com/fxml\"\n fx:controller=\"com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.SakibOme.ShipmentScheduleController\"\n prefHeight=\"650.0\" prefWidth=\"900.0\">\n <children>\n <Label text=\"Shipment Schedule & Delivery Monitoring\"\n style=\"-fx-font-size: 20px; -fx-font-weight: bold;\"\n AnchorPane.leftAnchor=\"20.0\" AnchorPane.topAnchor=\"14.0\"/>\n\n <VBox spacing=\"12.0\"\n AnchorPane.leftAnchor=\"20.0\" AnchorPane.rightAnchor=\"20.0\" AnchorPane.topAnchor=\"60.0\" >\n <children>\n <TextField fx:id=\"shipmentIdField\" promptText=\"Shipment ID\"/>\n\n <DatePicker fx:id=\"plannedDatePicker\" promptText=\"Planned Delivery Date\"/>\n\n <ComboBox fx:id=\"statusCombo\" promptText=\"Shipment Status\"/>\n\n <Button fx:id=\"viewScheduleButton\" text=\"View Current Schedule\" onAction=\"#onViewCurrentSchedule\"/>\n\n <TableView fx:id=\"scheduleTable\" prefHeight=\"300.0\">\n <columns>\n <TableColumn fx:id=\"colShipmentId\" text=\"Shipment ID\" prefWidth=\"160.0\"/>\n <TableColumn fx:id=\"colStatus\" text=\"Status\" prefWidth=\"140.0\"/>\n <TableColumn fx:id=\"colPlannedDate\" text=\"Planned Delivery Date\" prefWidth=\"180.0\"/>\n <TableColumn fx:id=\"colActualDate\" text=\"Actual Delivery Date\" prefWidth=\"180.0\"/>\n <TableColumn fx:id=\"colDelay\" text=\"Delay (if any)\" prefWidth=\"160.0\"/>\n </columns>\n </TableView>\n\n <Button fx:id=\"validateButton\" text=\"Validate Delivery Time\" onAction=\"#onValidateDeliveryTime\"/>\n\n <HBox spacing=\"10.0\">\n <children>\n <TextField fx:id=\"actualDateField\" promptText=\"Actual Delivery Date (yyyy-MM-dd)\"/>\n <TextField fx:id=\"deliveryNotesField\" promptText=\"Delivery Notes\"/>\n </children>\n </HBox>\n\n <Button fx:id=\"updateButton\" text=\"Update Delivery Record\" onAction=\"#onUpdateDeliveryRecord\"/>\n\n <Button fx:id=\"backButton\" text=\"Back to Menu\" onAction=\"#onBackToMenu\"/>\n </children>\n <padding>\n <Insets top=\"10\" right=\"10\" bottom=\"10\" left=\"10\"/>\n </padding>\n </VBox>\n </children>\n</AnchorPane>\n"}"}},{"id":"call_1x0UOEwsYIHpXApUVk6o7QBy","type":"function","function":{"name":"edit_file","arguments":"{"target_file":"src/main/java/com/example/group15chainmeatproducer/SakibOme/ShipmentScheduleController.java","instructions":"I will add the controller implementation with simple, comment-free code using ArrayList as the main data store.","code_edit":"package com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.SakibOme;\n\nimport com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.SceneManager;\nimport com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.SakibOme.model.ShipmentScheduleRecord;\nimport javafx.beans.property.SimpleStringProperty;\nimport javafx.collections.FXCollections;\nimport javafx.collections.ObservableList;\nimport javafx.event.ActionEvent;\nimport javafx.fxml.FXML;\nimport javafx.fxml.Initializable;\nimport javafx.scene.control.*;\nimport javafx.scene.control.cell.PropertyValueFactory;\n\nimport java.net.URL;\nimport java.time.LocalDate;\nimport java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;\nimport java.time.format.DateTimeParseException;\nimport java.util.ArrayList;\nimport java.util.List;\nimport java.util.ResourceBundle;\nimport java.util.stream.Collectors;\n\npublic class ShipmentScheduleController implements Initializable {\n\n @FXML private TextField shipmentIdField;\n @FXML private DatePicker plannedDatePicker;\n @FXML private ComboBox<String> statusCombo;\n @FXML private Button viewScheduleButton;\n @FXML private TableView<ShipmentScheduleRecord> scheduleTable;\n @FXML private TableColumn<ShipmentScheduleRecord, String> colShipmentId;\n @FXML private TableColumn<ShipmentScheduleRecord, String> colStatus;\n @FXML private TableColumn<ShipmentScheduleRecord, String> colPlannedDate;\n @FXML private TableColumn<ShipmentScheduleRecord, String> colActualDate;\n @FXML private TableColumn<ShipmentScheduleRecord, String> colDelay;\n @FXML private Button validateButton;\n @FXML private TextField actualDateField;\n @FXML private TextField deliveryNotesField;\n @FXML private Button updateButton;\n @FXML private Button backButton;\n\n private final List<ShipmentScheduleRecord> recordsStore = new ArrayList<>();\n private ObservableList<ShipmentScheduleRecord> tableItems;\n\n private static final DateTimeFormatter DATE_FORMATTER = DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern(\"yyyy-MM-dd\");\n\n @Override\n public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources) {\n List<String> statusOptions = new ArrayList<>();\n statusOptions.add(\"Scheduled\");\n statusOptions.add(\"In Transit\");\n statusOptions.add(\"Delivered\");\n statusOptions.add(\"Delayed\");\n statusCombo.setItems(FXCollections.observableList(statusOptions));\n\n tableItems = FXCollections.observableList(recordsStore);\n scheduleTable.setItems(tableItems);\n\n colShipmentId.setCellValueFactory(new PropertyValueFactory<>(\"shipmentId\"));\n colStatus.setCellValueFactory(new PropertyValueFactory<>(\"status\"));\n colPlannedDate.setCellValueFactory(cell -> new SimpleStringProperty(formatDate(cell.getValue().getPlannedDate())));\n colActualDate.setCellValueFactory(cell -> new SimpleStringProperty(formatDate(cell.getValue().getActualDate())));\n colDelay.setCellValueFactory(new PropertyValueFactory<>(\"delay\"));\n }\n\n @FXML\n private void onViewCurrentSchedule(ActionEvent event) {\n String id = valueOrEmpty(shipmentIdField.getText());\n String status = statusCombo.getValue();\n LocalDate planned = plannedDatePicker.getValue();\n if (id.isEmpty() && status == null && planned == null) {\n scheduleTable.setItems(tableItems);\n return;\n }\n List<ShipmentScheduleRecord> filtered = recordsStore.stream().filter(r ->\n (id.isEmpty() || r.getShipmentId().equalsIgnoreCase(id)) &&\n (status == null || r.getStatus().equalsIgnoreCase(status)) &&\n (planned == null || equalsDate(r.getPlannedDate(), planned))\n ).collect(Collectors.toList());\n scheduleTable.setItems(FXCollections.observableList(filtered));\n }\n\n @FXML\n private void onValidateDeliveryTime(ActionEvent event) {\n String id = valueOrEmpty(shipmentIdField.getText());\n LocalDate planned = plannedDatePicker.getValue();\n LocalDate actual = parseDateOrNull(valueOrEmpty(actualDateField.getText()));\n List<String> issues = new ArrayList<>();\n if (id.isEmpty()) issues.add(\"Shipment ID is required\");\n if (planned == null) issues.add(\"Planned Delivery Date is required\");\n if (!valueOrEmpty(actualDateField.getText()).isEmpty() && actual == null) issues.add(\"Actual Delivery Date format should be yyyy-MM-dd\");\n if (!issues.isEmpty()) {\n showAlert(\"Validation\", String.join(\"\\n\", issues), Alert.AlertType.WARNING);\n return;\n }\n if (actual == null) {\n showAlert(\"Validation\", \"No actual date provided. Delivery time cannot be evaluated yet.\", Alert.AlertType.INFORMATION);\n return;\n }\n long days = java.time.temporal.ChronoUnit.DAYS.between(planned, actual);\n if (days > 0) {\n showAlert(\"Validation\", \"Delivery delayed by \" + days + \" day(s).\", Alert.AlertType.INFORMATION);\n } else {\n showAlert(\"Validation\", \"Delivery on time.\", Alert.AlertType.INFORMATION);\n }\n }\n\n @FXML\n private void onUpdateDeliveryRecord(ActionEvent event) {\n String id = valueOrEmpty(shipmentIdField.getText());\n LocalDate planned = plannedDatePicker.getValue();\n String status = statusCombo.getValue();\n LocalDate actual = parseDateOrNull(valueOrEmpty(actualDateField.getText()));\n String notes = valueOrEmpty(deliveryNotesField.getText());\n List<String> issues = new ArrayList<>();\n if (id.isEmpty()) issues.add(\"Shipment ID is required\");\n if (planned == null) issues.add(\"Planned Delivery Date is required\");\n if (status == null || status.isEmpty()) issues.add(\"Please select a shipment status\");\n if (!valueOrEmpty(actualDateField.getText()).isEmpty() && actual == null) issues.add(\"Actual Delivery Date format should be yyyy-MM-dd\");\n if (!issues.isEmpty()) {\n showAlert(\"Update\", String.join(\"\\n\", issues), Alert.AlertType.WARNING);\n return;\n }\n ShipmentScheduleRecord existing = findById(id);\n if (existing == null) {\n ShipmentScheduleRecord r = new ShipmentScheduleRecord();\n r.setShipmentId(id);\n r.setStatus(status);\n r.setPlannedDate(planned);\n r.setActualDate(actual);\n r.setDelay(makeDelay(planned, actual));\n r.setNotes(notes);\n tableItems.add(r);\n } else {\n existing.setStatus(status);\n existing.setPlannedDate(planned);\n existing.setActualDate(actual);\n existing.setDelay(makeDelay(planned, actual));\n existing.setNotes(notes);\n scheduleTable.refresh();\n }\n clearForm();\n showAlert(\"Update\", \"Delivery record saved.\", Alert.AlertType.INFORMATION);\n }\n\n @FXML\n private void onBackToMenu(ActionEvent event) {\n SceneManager.switchToLogin(event);\n }\n\n private ShipmentScheduleRecord findById(String id) {\n for (ShipmentScheduleRecord r : recordsStore) {\n if (r.getShipmentId().equalsIgnoreCase(id)) return r;\n }\n return null;\n }\n\n private String valueOrEmpty(String s) {\n return s == null ? \"\" : s.trim();\n }\n\n private boolean equalsDate(LocalDate a, LocalDate b) {\n if (a == null || b == null) return false;\n return a.isEqual(b);\n }\n\n private String formatDate(LocalDate d) {\n if (d == null) return \"\";\n return DATE_FORMATTER.format(d);\n }\n\n private LocalDate parseDateOrNull(String s) {\n if (s.isEmpty()) return null;\n try {\n return LocalDate.parse(s, DATE_FORMATTER);\n } catch (DateTimeParseException e) {\n return null;\n }\n }\n\n private String makeDelay(LocalDate planned, LocalDate actual) {\n if (planned == null || actual == null) return \"\";\n long days = @@ -1,1 +1,212 @@
+package com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.SakibOme;
 
+import com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.SceneManager;
+import com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.SakibOme.model.ShipmentScheduleRecord;
+import javafx.beans.property.SimpleStringProperty;
+import javafx.collections.FXCollections;
+import javafx.collections.ObservableList;
+import javafx.event.ActionEvent;
+import javafx.fxml.FXML;
+import javafx.fxml.Initializable;
+import javafx.scene.control.*;
+import javafx.scene.control.cell.PropertyValueFactory;
+
+import java.net.URL;
+import java.time.LocalDate;
+import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
+import java.time.format.DateTimeParseException;
+import java.util.ArrayList;
+import java.util.List;
+import java.util.ResourceBundle;
+import java.util.stream.Collectors;
+
+public class ShipmentScheduleController implements Initializable {
+
+ @FXML
+ private TextField shipmentIdField;
+ @FXML
+ private DatePicker plannedDatePicker;
+ @FXML
+ private ComboBox<String> statusCombo;
+ @FXML
+ private Button viewScheduleButton;
+ @FXML
+ private TableView<ShipmentScheduleRecord> scheduleTable;
+ @FXML
+ private TableColumn<ShipmentScheduleRecord, String> colShipmentId;
+ @FXML
+ private TableColumn<ShipmentScheduleRecord, String> colStatus;
+ @FXML
+ private TableColumn<ShipmentScheduleRecord, String> colPlannedDate;
+ @FXML
+ private TableColumn<ShipmentScheduleRecord, String> colActualDate;
+ @FXML
+ private TableColumn<ShipmentScheduleRecord, String> colDelay;
+ @FXML
+ private Button validateButton;
+ @FXML
+ private TextField actualDateField;
+ @FXML
+ private TextField deliveryNotesField;
+ @FXML
+ private Button updateButton;
+ @FXML
+ private Button backButton;
+
+ private final List<ShipmentScheduleRecord> recordsStore = new ArrayList<>();
+ private ObservableList<ShipmentScheduleRecord> tableItems;
+
+ private static final DateTimeFormatter DATE_FORMATTER = DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("yyyy-MM-dd");
+
+ @Override
+ public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources) {
+ List<String> statusOptions = new ArrayList<>();
+ statusOptions.add("Scheduled");
+ statusOptions.add("In Transit");
+ statusOptions.add("Delivered");
+ statusOptions.add("Delayed");
+ statusCombo.setItems(FXCollections.observableList(statusOptions));
+
+ tableItems = FXCollections.observableList(recordsStore);
+ scheduleTable.setItems(tableItems);
+
+ colShipmentId.setCellValueFactory(new PropertyValueFactory<>("shipmentId"));
+ colStatus.setCellValueFactory(new PropertyValueFactory<>("status"));
+ colPlannedDate.setCellValueFactory(cell -> new SimpleStringProperty(formatDate(cell.getValue().getPlannedDate())));
+ colActualDate.setCellValueFactory(cell -> new SimpleStringProperty(formatDate(cell.getValue().getActualDate())));
+ colDelay.setCellValueFactory(new PropertyValueFactory<>("delay"));
+ }
+
+ @FXML
+ private void onViewCurrentSchedule(ActionEvent event) {
+ String id = valueOrEmpty(shipmentIdField.getText());
+ String status = statusCombo.getValue();
+ LocalDate planned = plannedDatePicker.getValue();
+ if (id.isEmpty() && status == null && planned == null) {
+ scheduleTable.setItems(tableItems);
+ return;
+ }
+ List<ShipmentScheduleRecord> filtered = recordsStore.stream().filter(r ->
+ (id.isEmpty() || r.getShipmentId().equalsIgnoreCase(id)) &&
+ (status == null || r.getStatus().equalsIgnoreCase(status)) &&
+ (planned == null || equalsDate(r.getPlannedDate(), planned))
+ ).collect(Collectors.toList());
+ scheduleTable.setItems(FXCollections.observableList(filtered));
+ }
+
+ @FXML
+ private void onValidateDeliveryTime(ActionEvent event) {
+ String id = valueOrEmpty(shipmentIdField.getText());
+ LocalDate planned = plannedDatePicker.getValue();
+ LocalDate actual = parseDateOrNull(valueOrEmpty(actualDateField.getText()));
+ List<String> issues = new ArrayList<>();
+ if (id.isEmpty()) issues.add("Shipment ID is required");
+ if (planned == null) issues.add("Planned Delivery Date is required");
+ if (!valueOrEmpty(actualDateField.getText()).isEmpty() && actual == null)
+ issues.add("Actual Delivery Date format should be yyyy-MM-dd");
+ if (!issues.isEmpty()) {
+ showAlert("Validation", String.join("\n", issues), Alert.AlertType.WARNING);
+ return;
+ }
+ if (actual == null) {
+ showAlert("Validation", "No actual date provided. Delivery time cannot be evaluated yet.", Alert.AlertType.INFORMATION);
+ return;
+ }
+ long days = java.time.temporal.ChronoUnit.DAYS.between(planned, actual);
+ if (days > 0) {
+ showAlert("Validation", "Delivery delayed by " + days + " day(s).", Alert.AlertType.INFORMATION);
+ } else {
+ showAlert("Validation", "Delivery on time.", Alert.AlertType.INFORMATION);
+ }
+ }
+
+ @FXML
+ private void onUpdateDeliveryRecord(ActionEvent event) {
+ String id = valueOrEmpty(shipmentIdField.getText());
+ LocalDate planned = plannedDatePicker.getValue();
+ String status = statusCombo.getValue();
+ LocalDate actual = parseDateOrNull(valueOrEmpty(actualDateField.getText()));
+ String notes = valueOrEmpty(deliveryNotesField.getText());
+ List<String> issues = new ArrayList<>();
+ if (id.isEmpty()) issues.add("Shipment ID is required");
+ if (planned == null) issues.add("Planned Delivery Date is required");
+ if (status == null || status.isEmpty()) issues.add("Please select a shipment status");
+ if (!valueOrEmpty(actualDateField.getText()).isEmpty() && actual == null)
+ issues.add("Actual Delivery Date format should be yyyy-MM-dd");
+ if (!issues.isEmpty()) {
+ showAlert("Update", String.join("\n", issues), Alert.AlertType.WARNING);
+ return;
+ }
+ ShipmentScheduleRecord existing = findById(id);
+ if (existing == null) {
+ ShipmentScheduleRecord r = new ShipmentScheduleRecord();
+ r.setShipmentId(id);
+ r.setStatus(status);
+ r.setPlannedDate(planned);
+ r.setActualDate(actual);
+ r.setDelay(makeDelay(planned, actual));
+ r.setNotes(notes);
+ tableItems.add(r);
+ } else {
+ existing.setStatus(status);
+ existing.setPlannedDate(planned);
+ existing.setActualDate(actual);
+ existing.setDelay(makeDelay(planned, actual));
+ existing.setNotes(notes);
+ scheduleTable.refresh();
+ }
+ clearForm();
+ showAlert("Update", "Delivery record saved.", Alert.AlertType.INFORMATION);
+ }
+
+ @FXML
+ private void onBackToMenu(ActionEvent event) {
+ SceneManager.switchToLogin(event);
+ }
+
+ private ShipmentScheduleRecord findById(String id) {
+ for (ShipmentScheduleRecord r : recordsStore) {
+ if (r.getShipmentId().equalsIgnoreCase(id)) return r;
+ }
+ return null;
+ }
+
+ private String valueOrEmpty(String s) {
+ return s == null ? "" : s.trim();
+ }
+
+ private boolean equalsDate(LocalDate a, LocalDate b) {
+ if (a == null || b == null) return false;
+ return a.isEqual(b);
+ }
+
+ private String formatDate(LocalDate d) {
+ if (d == null) return "";
+ return DATE_FORMATTER.format(d);
+ }
+
+ private LocalDate parseDateOrNull(String s) {
+ if (s.isEmpty()) return null;
+ try {
+ return LocalDate.parse(s, DATE_FORMATTER);
+ } catch (DateTimeParseException e) {
+ return null;
+ }
+ }
+
+ private String makeDelay(LocalDate planned, LocalDate actual) {
+ if (planned == null || actual == null) return "";
+ long days = java.time.temporal.ChronoUnit.DAYS.between(planned, actual);
+ if (days <= 0) return "";
+ return days + " day(s)";
+ }
+
+ private void clearForm() {
+ shipmentIdField.clear();
+ plannedDatePicker.setValue(null);
+ statusCombo.getSelectionModel().clearSelection();
+ actualDateField.clear();
+ deliveryNotesField.clear();
+ }
+}
+
```

### What’s included

 - Layout elements:
 - Label: “Shipment Schedule & Delivery Monitoring”
 - TextField: `shipmentIdField`

 - ComboBox: `statusCombo` (Scheduled, In Transit, Delivered, Delayed)

- Controller (no comments; simple, human-readable)

 - Uses `ArrayList<ShipmentScheduleRecord>` for storage; TableView bound via `FXCollections.observableList(recordsStore)`
 - Handlers:
 - `onViewCurrentSchedule`: shows all or filters by ID/status/planned date
 - `onValidateDeliveryTime`: checks input and reports delay vs on-time
 - `onUpdateDeliveryRecord`: creates/updates record; recalculates delay; refreshes table; clears form
 - `onBackToMenu`: navigates to login via `SceneManager.switchToLogin(event)`
 - Date format: `yyyy-MM-dd`
 - No comments included

- Model (separate file; POJO)
 - File: `src/main/java/com/example/group15chainmeatproducer/SakibOme/model/ShipmentScheduleRecord.java`
 - Fields: `shipmentId`, `status`, `plannedDate`, `actualDate`, `delay`, `notes`

- Key points

fx:controller=\"com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.SakibOme.TransportationCostController\"\n prefHeight=\"700.0\" prefWidth=\"1000.0\">\n <children>\n <Label text=\"Transportation Cost Tracking & Reduction\"\n style=\"-fx-font-size: 20px; -fx-font-weight: bold;\"\n AnchorPane.leftAnchor=\"20.0\" AnchorPane.topAnchor=\"14.0\"/>\n\n <VBox spacing=\"12.0\"\n AnchorPane.leftAnchor=\"20.0\" AnchorPane.rightAnchor=\"20.0\" AnchorPane.topAnchor=\"60.0\">\n <children>\n <TableView fx:id=\"costTable\" prefHeight=\"260.0\">\n <columns>\n <TableColumn fx:id=\"colMonth\" text=\"Month\" prefWidth=\"120.0\"/>\n <TableColumn fx:id=\"colRoute\" text=\"Route\" prefWidth=\"180.0\"/>\n <TableColumn fx:id=\"colMode\" text=\"Transport Mode\" prefWidth=\"160.0\"/>\n <TableColumn fx:id=\"colTotalCost\" text=\"Total Cost\" prefWidth=\"140.0\"/>\n <TableColumn fx:id=\"colCostPerShipment\" text=\"Cost per Shipment\" prefWidth=\"160.0\"/>\n <TableColumn fx:id=\"colVariance\" text=\"Variance from Last Month (%)\" prefWidth=\"220.0\"/>\n </columns>\n </TableView>\n\n <Label text=\"Add / Update Cost Record\" style=\"-fx-font-size: 14px; -fx-font-weight: bold;\"/>\n\n <HBox spacing=\"10.0\">\n <children>\n <TextField fx:id=\"routeField\" promptText=\"Route\"/>\n <ComboBox fx:id=\"modeCombo\" promptText=\"Transport Mode\"/>\n <TextField fx:id=\"totalCostField\" promptText=\"Total Cost\"/>\n <DatePicker fx:id=\"costMonthPicker\" promptText=\"Cost Month\"/>\n </children>\n </HBox>\n\n <Button fx:id=\"saveButton\" text=\"Save Cost Record\" onAction=\"#onSaveCostRecord\"/>\n\n <Label text=\"Cost Reduction Suggestions\" style=\"-fx-font-size: 14px; -fx-font-weight: bold;\"/>\n <TextArea fx:id=\"suggestionsArea\" promptText=\"Suggestions will appear here\" prefRowCount=\"6\" wrapText=\"true\"/>\n\n <HBox spacing=\"10.0\">\n <children>\n <Button fx:id=\"runAnalysisButton\" text=\"Run Cost Analysis\" onAction=\"#onRunCostAnalysis\"/>\n <Button fx:id=\"validateButton\" text=\"Validate Cost Data\" onAction=\"#onValidateCostData\"/>\n <Button fx:id=\"backButton\" text=\"Back to Menu\" onAction=\"#onBackToMenu\"/>\n </children>\n will add the controller using an ArrayList store and simple, comment-free logic.","code_edit":"package com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.SakibOme;\n\nimport com.example.group15chainmeatproducer.SceneManager;\nimport javafx.beans.property.SimpleStringProperty;\nimport javafx.collections.FXCollections;\nimport javafx.collections.ObservableList;\nimport javafx.event.ActionEvent;\nimport javafx.fxml.FXML;\nimport javafx.fxml.Initializable;\nimport javafx.scene.control.*;\nimport javafx.scene.control.cell.PropertyValueFactory;\n\nimport java.net.URL;\nimport java.time.LocalDate;\nimport java.time.YearMonth;\nimport java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;\nimport java.util.ArrayList;\nimport java.util.Comparator;\nimport java.util.HashMap;\nimport java.util.List;\nimport java.util.Map;\nimport java.util.ResourceBundle;\nimport java.util.stream.Collectors;\n\npublic class TransportationCostController implements Initializable {\n\n @FXML private TableView<TransportationCostRecord> costTable;\n @FXML private TableColumn<TransportationCostRecord, String> colMonth;\n @FXML private TableColumn<TransportationCostRecord, String> colRoute;\n @FXML private TableColumn<TransportationCostRecord, String> colMode;\n @FXML private TableColumn<TransportationCostRecord, String> colTotalCost;\n @FXML private TableColumn<TransportationCostRecord, String> colCostPerShipment;\n @FXML private TableColumn<TransportationCostRecord, String> colVariance;\n\n @FXML private TextField routeField;\n @FXML private ComboBox<String> modeCombo;\n @FXML private TextField totalCostField;\n @FXML private DatePicker costMonthPicker;\n @FXML private Button saveButton;\n @FXML private TextArea suggestionsArea;\n @FXML private Button runAnalysisButton;\n @FXML private Button validateButton;\n @FXML private Button backButton;\n\n private final List<TransportationCostRecord> costStore = new ArrayList<>();\n private ObservableList<TransportationCostRecord> tableItems;\n\n private static final DateTimeFormatter MONTH_FORMAT = DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern(\"yyyy-MM\");\n\n @Override\n public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources) {\n List<String> modes = new ArrayList<>();\n modes.add(\"Truck\");\n modes.add(\"Air\");\n modes.add(\"Ship\");\n modes.add(\"Rail\");\n modeCombo.setItems(FXCollections.observableList(modes));\n\n tableItems = FXCollections.observableList(costStore);\n costTable.setItems(tableItems);\n\n colRoute.setCellValueFactory(new PropertyValueFactory<>(\"route\"));\n colMode.setCellValueFactory(new PropertyValueFactory<>(\"transportMode\"));\n colMonth.setCellValueFactory(cell -> new SimpleStringProperty(formatMonth(cell.getValue().getCostMonth())));\n colTotalCost.setCellValueFactory(cell -> new SimpleStringProperty(formatMoney(cell.getValue().getTotalCost())));\n colCostPerShipment.setCellValueFactory(cell -> new SimpleStringProperty(formatMoney(cell.getValue().getCostPerShipment())));\n colVariance.setCellValueFactory(cell -> new SimpleStringProperty(formatPercent(cell.getValue().getVariancePercent())));\n }\n\n @FXML\n private void onSaveCostRecord(ActionEvent event) {\n String route = trimOrEmpty(routeField.getText());\n String mode = modeCombo.getValue();\n String costText = trimOrEmpty(totalCostField.getText());\n LocalDate date = costMonthPicker.getValue();\n List<String> issues = new ArrayList<>();\n if (route.isEmpty()) issues.add(\"Route is required\");\n if (mode == null || mode.isEmpty()) issues.add(\"Transport Mode is required\");\n Double totalCost = parsePositiveDouble(costText);\n if (totalCost == null) issues.add(\"Total Cost must be a positive number\");\n if (date == null) issues.add(\"Cost Month is required\");\n if (!issues.isEmpty()) {\n showAlert(\"Save\", String.join(\"\\n\", issues), Alert.AlertType.WARNING);\n return;\n }\n LocalDate normalized = normalizeToFirstOfMonth(date);\n TransportationCostRecord existing = findByKey(route, mode, normalized);\n if (existing == null) {\n TransportationCostRecord r = new TransportationCostRecord();\n r.setRoute(route);\n r.setTransportMode(mode);\n r.setCostMonth(normalized);\n r.setTotalCost(totalCost);\n r.setCostPerShipment(calculateCostPerShipment(mode, totalCost));\n r.setVariancePercent(calculateVariancePercent(route, mode, normalized, totalCost));\n tableItems.add(r);\n } else {\n existing.setTotalCost(totalCost);\n existing.setCostPerShipment(calculateCostPerShipment(mode, totalCost));\n existing.setVariancePercent(calculateVariancePercent(route, mode, normalized, totalCost));\n costTable.refresh();\n }\n clearForm();\n showAlert(\"Save\", \"Cost record saved.\", Alert.AlertType.INFORMATION);\n }\n\n @FXML\n private void onRunCostAnalysis(ActionEvent event) {\n if (costStore.isEmpty()) {\n suggestionsArea.setText(\"No data available for analysis.\");\n return;\n }\n StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();\n Map<String, Double> routeTotals = new HashMap<>();\n for (TransportationCostRecord r : costStore) {\n String key = r.getRoute() + \" | \" + r.getTransportMode();\n routeTotals.put(key, routeTotals.getOrDefault(key, 0.0) + r.getTotalCost());\n }\n List<Map.Entry<String, Double>> sorted = routeTotals.entrySet().stream()\n
